EmailTemplate.subject: Register: Missouri Tech Seminar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join Us Missouri Technology Seminar
We hope that you will join us and fellow VisiCAD users at our Missouri Technology Seminar, where we will discuss the latest trends in technology and the upcoming release of VisiCAD and ProQA.
9 AM - 10 AM - Priority Dispatch Discussion of new Paramount ProQA Release
10 AM - 3 PM - TriTech Software Systems -System Architecture - Changes from 4.5 to 5.0 -VisiCAD and Virtualization for Reducing IT Costs - What you need to know -Achieving Remote Connectivity - Citrix vs. ClearCube, two different solutions and requirements for success -Sneak Peek - Discover the new functionality available in VisiCAD version 5.0
Event Details:
Date: Wednesday, December 7
Time: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM
Location: Lake St. Louis Fire Protection District - Station 1 2533 Lake St.Louis Blvd. Lake St. Louis, MO 63367
Cost: Complimentary (Continental breakfast and lunch included)
Registration: http://offers.tritech.com/MissouriTechSeminarClients_Registration.html
Questions? Sally Olson-Nelson, Client Account Manager Mobile: 727.688.7001 Email: sally.olson-nelson@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
